channel.title: about on single plot
channel.description: Recent content in about on single plot

item.title: digital garden
item.description: digital garden ❀ ✿ # This website is intended as a digital garden. At risk of sounding like a saccharine attempt to redefine what a blog is, the concept is fairly simple: a place where ideas are planted, watered and pruned over time. This happens to be my garden, which I prefer to keep a little wild, with a blend of notes, fragments and ideas. It’s my plot of land where I’ve put my stake.
